duties_responsibilities.duty: Be the primary contact among the team of support personnel working to ensure 100% uptime of NHL Game Operations and Broadcast Operations systems at NHL arenas.
Manage all cabling used in the arena for NHL audio/video systems and NHL HITS scoring and TVI systems.

Record all hardware, software, network, and system issues in the NHL’s internal central ticketing system, while escalating appropriate issues to NHL Helpdesk, the Technical Operations Center, and/or designated NHL Technical Operations Managers.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 yrs of Tier 1 support of Technical Systems
